真的要清空吗？: Do you really want to delete all?
点击右上角按钮，打开悬浮地图: Click the button in the top right to open the floating map
请确保原神已经运行: Please ensure Genshin Impact is running.
Knocking on the door of an astrologer prodigy...
已经是最新版本: You're already on the latest version
这些选项将在程序重启后生效。: The options below will take effects after a reload.
发送错误日志，协助我们改进程序: Send error reports to help us fixing bugs
启用OCR识别错误反馈功能: Show feedback button on OCR page
这些选项将在下次打开识别器或切换器时生效。: The options below will take effects when you open recognizor or switcher next time.
得到两个完全一致的圣遗物的概率是多少呢？: Enable this if you wish to keep artifacts with identical stats.
允许在关闭识别器时，保留切换器窗口以配合其他工具使用。: Enable this to use the switcher standalone or work with third party softwares.
圣遗物切换器每次点击（并识别完成）后切换到下一个的间隔。: The delay before switching to the next artifact after scanning one.
可用于人工检查识别准确性，或关闭识别器窗口并配合其他工具使用。: Useful if you want to check errors manually or use standalone switcher with other tools.
一个简单的原神工具箱，保证每一行代码都是加班打造。是半仙之兽。: A simple toolbox for Genshin Impact with every line of code made by working overtime.
工作…工作还没做完…真的可以提前休息吗？: Should we really be off work this early? There is still a lot left to do...
If you lie on the grass, you can feel the heartbeat of the world.
开发模式无法自动更新: Autoupgrade is disabled in development mode.
清除保存的窗口数据: Reset saved window size and position
这在你找不到悬浮窗时或许有用。: May be useful when you can't find the overlay windows.
这将清除大地图的登录信息和本地标点等: This will remove saved login information, local map markers, etc.
这是一个简单的原神工具箱，提供圣遗物识别等便利功能。: This is a toolbox for Genshin Impact featuring artifacts exporting and so on.
There's something you need to check before we start.
保存后，您可以随时在设置页面更改这些选项，但需要重启程序生效。除此之外，本程序会: You can change those settings anytime after saving in the Options page, but they will take effects after a reload. Besides these, this application checks for updates automatically everytime it starts. Clicking the button below means you agree what's written here.
无法确认行列数量。请确认圣遗物列表的顶部对齐某一行的顶端，且当前页不是最后一页，: Can't confirm number of rows and columns. Please check if the top of artifacts list aligns to the top of a row of artifacts and current page is not the last page, or go to a dark place and reopen your backpack.
请确保您已经使切换器窗口恰好包围圣遗物列表区域。如始终提示出错，请提交反馈。: Please make sure you let the switcher fittingly surrounds the list of artifacts area. If you are always prompted for an error, submit feedback.
如鼠标无法选中本窗口，请按热键(~): If your mouse cannot select this window, please press the hotkey (~).
反馈识别信息将会发送以下内容到我们的服务器：: The feedback will send the following content to our server:
您设备的屏幕分辨率和dpi: The screen resolution and DPI of your device
本地OCR识别结果与纠错尝试: Local OCR recognition results and error correction attempts
您在下方填写的备注文字信息: The note text you fill in below
若您不主动向我们反馈，这些内容都会在识别下一个圣遗物后被删除。: If you do not provide feedback to us, these contents will be removed after the next artifact is recognized.
有什么特别的备注吗？也可以留空。: Any special information? You can also leave it blank.
请以窗口模式打开游戏背包圣遗物界面， 将本窗口拖动至游戏上方并调节大小，使圣遗物: Please open Genshin in window mode and open the artifact page, drag and resize this window to where each attribute in the right box. Then use the button below or hotkey (~) to start.
识别错了？点此反馈: Wrong answer? Click here to feedback
数据已提交，我们将尽快检查与改进。: Feedback sent successfully, we will check and try to imporve soon.
您的系统似乎没有启用Aero，识别功能可能无法正常使用。: Scanner may not work because Aero is not enabled.
您的系统似乎没有安装微软运行库 (下载地址：https://aka.ms/vs/: Scanner may not work because Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable (Link: https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe) is not installed.
如果出现翻页时滚动过快跳过行的情况，或您正在高延迟环境下使用云游戏，请关闭此项。: Please disable this if some lines are skipped because of scrolling too fast or you're using cloud gaming platforms with a high latency.
（可能导致极少量圣遗物不入库）: (May cause a very few number of artifacts skipped.)
启用后，程序将模拟一个Xbox手柄。圣遗物切换器将使用模拟的手柄进行切换。: The program will simulate a Xbox Controller when this option is enabled, which will be used in the artifact switcher.
您需要先启用此功能再启动游戏，而后在游戏内设置控制模式为手柄。: You need to enable this before starting the game. Then, set the "Control Type" to "Controller" in the game.
为提供简单操作的能力，以下按键映射将被启用：ABXY为键盘的对应按键，左右肩键为:
To prevent loss of control of the game, these key mappings will be enabled:
A: A, B: B, X:X, Y:Y, LT: Page Up; RT: Page Down; Menu: ESC; Joystick: Arrow Keys
该版本暂不支持自动更新: Auto upgrade is not supported in this wersion.
请下载并安装ViGEm驱动 (https://vigem.org/) 以使用手柄: Please download and install the ViGem Driver (https://vigem.org/) to enable joystick simulation.
